feat: complete getCurrentDate implementation for all date-based tools

Extended default current date functionality to estimates and materials tools.
All JobNimbus MCP tools with date parameters now default to today''s date 
when users don''t specify dates explicitly.

Additional tools modified:
- getEstimates.ts - estimates with date_from/date_to defaults
- analyzeMaterialCosts.ts - material cost analysis defaults
- getMaterialUsageReport.ts - usage report defaults
- getSupplierComparison.ts - supplier comparison defaults
- getMaterialInventoryInsights.ts - inventory insights defaults

All tools now consistently filter by current date by default across:
- Jobs & Activities (10 tools) - already completed
- Estimates (1 tool) - completed in this commit
- Materials (4 tools) - completed in this commit
- Analytics (24 tools) - already use days_back pattern (correct)

Total: 39 tools with proper date defaulting behavior
